Articles.Content:
It would be nice to keep track of all flights (where, how long, which kerbals where on it).

Same for the Kerbals; how many hours have they been in space, on EVA, where have they been, when did they join. How much science did each provide.

And for the agency; how many flights went to Mun, Duna, ...

Something like this: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/898/Flight%20Statistic](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/898/Flight%20Statistic) (I cannot get it to work on 1.0.4. using 64-bit Linux).

cheers,

paul
